Morecambe Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
morecambe-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Maritana [arr. Smith]
Winter Gardens, Morecambe, Lancashire
Prizes !st £15 and cup valued £50, 2nd £8, 3rd £5, 4th £2, 5th £1.
March contest 1st Barrow Shipyard, 2nd Longridge.
Best cornet and euphonium - aworth, best trombone - Longridge,
6 bands competed.
Promoted by Morecambe Borough Silver Band.
Oct. 27, 2012, 3:44 p.m. Oct. 27, 2012, 3:52 p.m.
